scripts.build: yarn run build:api && yarn workspace @oasis/web run build
scripts.build:api: yarn workspace @oasis/api run build && yarn workspace @oasis/client-gql run build
scripts.deploy:prod: git add . && git commit -m 'chore(deploy): Merge staging -> prod' && git checkout prod && git merge staging && git push origin prod --force && git checkout staging
scripts.lint: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude @oasis/client-gql -p run lint && yarn workspaces foreach --exclude @oasis/client-gql -p run prettify
scripts.clean: yarn workspace @oasis/api run clean && yarn workspace @oasis/client-gql run clean
scripts.reinstall: yarn clean && rimraf packages/**/*.sqlite || yarn install
